actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief Earl Gilbert, Larry Collins, Vern C. Parton, Alexander L. Adams, and John Kimm.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a yet to be determined sum to five named individuals in full satisfaction of a claim against the United States arising out of losses incurred by them due to a quarantine imposed by the United States Department of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill for the relief Earl Gilbert, Larry Collins, Vern C. Parton, Alexander L. Adams, and John Kimm.
